short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: flowres users can forward a mail to their messages on flowres

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of all communication from various sources at one place. This extension allows you to forward your project related mails to flowres messaging which is shared among project coordinators. Currently supports Gmail only. Use project CC email for other mail clients.
